toolset_description:
Revil Toolset

Revil Toolset is a collection of modding tools for RE Engine/MT Framework titles.

This toolset runs on Spike foundation.

Head to this Wiki for more information on how to effectively use it.

Latest Release

## Release authenticity Every release asset will contain corresponding `.sig` file, together with [Sign Key](sign_key.asc) can be used to verify asset via gpg. Simple usage: ```bash gpg --import sign_key.asc # Required only once gpg --verify .sig ```
ddon_sngw: Encrypts or decrypts `.sngw` sounds/music files from Dragons Dogma Online.
mod_to_gltf: Converts MT Framework `.mod` model into GLTF format.
lmt_to_gltf: Converts MT Framework `.lmt` motion list into GLTF format.
mtf_tex_to_dds: Converts MT Framework `.tex` texture into DDS format.
sdl_to_xml: Converts MT Framework `.sdl` scheduler into XML format.
xml_to_sdl: Converts XML format back to MT Framework `.sdl` scheduler.
re_tex_to_dds: Converts RE Engine `.tex` texture into DDS format.
reasset_to_gltf: Converts RE Engine various assets into GLTF format. Currently only supports animations.
spac_conv:
Extracts MT Framework `.spc` sound containers.
### Supported formats within SPAC archive
- FWSE, Modified IMA ADPCM, PC - MSF, Various formats (16bit PCM, AT3, ...), PS3 - RIFF WAVE, Various formats (MS IMA ADPCM mostly), PC
xfs_to_xml: Converts MT Framework generic binary data table format into XML.
obb_extract: Extract Android .obb archives for Monster Hunter Stories.
